name: Commando Counter Terrorist
description:
As a soldier, you have to use your gun to destroy dangerous enemies. To show you the world of superb combat skills, to become a battlefield hero. Are you ready to fight the terrorists on the real battlefield? It is time to attack, pick up your weapons, move forward, fight on the battlefield. Destroy the brutal enemy, complete the mission.

Features:
- Complete battlefield and realistic 3d environments.
- Multiple targets and scenarios!
- Breathtaking music and sound effects
- Great graphics and environment with cool animations.
- Face challenges and improve your shooting skills
- Realistic weather conditions and new challenges in missions
